reviewText:
My boyfriend owns 24 Peach DVDs, including this one. We notice that some DVD boxes have errors about the casts, e.g. this one lists Karlie Montana who is not in it. Some scenes are in several DVDs, as you shall see. This DVD has nine scenes: 1. Covergirl Lux Kassidy solo, 2. Heather Vandeven alone, 3. Elena Rivera and Zoe Britton Girl-on-Girl, 4. Sabrina Rose, 5. Lela Star, 6. Charlie Laine, 7. Lux and Sabrina G-o-G, 8. Samantha Ryan and 9. Isabella Camille! Which girls and scenes do we like best?
9th to us is Zoe Britton a rather chubby brunette. We prefer ladies who are more trim and fit, and this DVD has some of them. Aiya, someone must place last in any contest.
8th we think is Sabrina Rose a mediocre blonde with a "dip" (butterfly) tattoo above her "pigu" (butt) and to the right. We hate tattoos and body piercings.
7th is Samantha Ryan a blonde with modest breasts and nice legs. She has tattoos on her left wrist (large) and above her butt at right (small).
6th is Elena Rivera a brunette Latina who is prettier than the girls rated 7th to 9th but not as pretty as the girls rated 5th to 1st. Two girls together hide much of their bodies.
5th is the covergirl Lux Kassidy who is an attractive blonde. She's the prettiesst and sexiest girl listed so far. She has a navel piercing and large stars tattooed at left and right of her groin. She seems to have many moles on her body, but my boyfriend viewed them enlarged 4X and sees some are tiny tattoos of asterisks. This lowers her score a bit.
4th is Charlie Laine the brunette "Penthouse" magazine Pet for February 2006. She has a 32"/23"/33" figure with a buxom butt. She has a pierced navel. Bad lighting affects her scene and some others. She is better in some other Peach DVDs, e.g. "Sex In The City".
3rd is Heather Vandeven the 5'-8", 115 lbs. blonde "Penthouse" Pet of January 2006 and Pet of the Year 2007. She has a pierced navel but no tattoos. There is a reddish spot on her right shoulder that may be a bruise or a birthmark. She is a beautiful Dutch girl who was born 9/16/81 in Hollywood, CA. Her scene is sexy in this 2009 DVD, and it is a repeat of one in "Bombs Away" (2008). She is even sexier in "PJ Party Secrets". She has two great scenes in "Resort Tales" and one is repeated in "Girls of Peach, #9". My boyfriend says Heather closely resembles his favorite girlfriend in college who was Frederika "Freddie" Schreuder an exchange student from the Netherlands. (I am a Chinese exchange student.)
2nd to us is Lela Star a 5'-1", 100 lbs. brunette Cuban born 6/13/85 in Miami, FL. She was the July 2010 Pet in "Penthouse" magazine. She has very sexy scenes in several Peach DVDs. Heather is prettier than Lela, but her scene this time is not as sexy. Lela has a navel piercing and two tattoos- a wide floral one above her butt and a star right of her groin.
1st in our estimation is Isabella Camille (a.k.a. Nikki French, Leisha, Pavlina, etc.) a 5'-3" brunette born 9/14/73 in Brno, Czech Republic. My boyfriend has a pistol made in Brno, and he knows some Czech girls whose surnames usually end with "-ova", e.g. Jarova. Isabella is stunningly beautiful and very sexy, and her scene is a sexy one, so she easily wins the top position in this DVD in our opinion. The scene is a repeat of hers in "Bedroom Secrets" (2008) in which she has stiffer competition.
Overall, with 9 scenes that are good to excellent, this DVD is a Must Have for fans of sexy ladies pinup DVDs.

On the cover is sexy blonde Lux Cassidy. My favorite girl in this film is called "Isabelle Camille" this time. She's a Czech lady who has used several different screen names, e.g. Nikki French. I think she is very beautiful and sexy, and her scene is sexy too. You can't beat that. Her scene is repeated in another Peach film about "Bedrooms". The other girls are different in it. In this one, I don't think the other girls rival Isabelle, but some aren't bad, e.g. covergirl Lux and former "Penthouse" Pet Charlie Laine. I haven't watched any scenes besides Isabelle's for a while.
